title: Language Expert Competency Development Program through Work-Integrated Learning (WIL) and Online Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level language expertise and basic online learning experience
context.additional_context: Integrated program for current professionals (medical/legal/technical fields) performing language-related workplace training while engaging in online theoretical learning; aims to enhance work applicability through intensive one-week completion

learning_goals: Learners can apply language expertise to real-world workplace environments (translation/interpreting/communication) through WIL (Work-Integrated Learning) practice.
Learners can utilize language strategies acquired in online theoretical lessons to solve practical problems encountered during practice.
Learners can reflectively evaluate practical experiences and propose improvement plans based on feedback from peers and experts.

resources: Real-time collaboration tools (Miro, Google Docs, etc.)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
